content: tabula rasa by johanna ylistö @hippusia about this sock pattern was written to be magic looped if you re not familiar with this technique you can find several videos on youtube to get you started i recommend you to knit only one sock at a time due to diagonal lines on instep purple notes are there to help you keep track of pattern and stitch count please read the whole pattern through before casting on happy knitting cuff cast on 72 sts place 38 sts on needle 1 front leg and instep and 34 sts on needle 2 back leg and sole be careful not to twist when joining in round ribbing *p2 k2* for 14 rounds leg work chart a on needle 1 continue ribbing on needle 2 * instead of 18 stockinette stitches in chart a you can use your own imagination there s a blank chart on the last page that you can use to make your own design feel free to make cables lace or different kind of stitch patterns these socks have quite lots of stitches and ribbing so no worries about extra cables making these too snug chart a continue until piece mesures approximately 15 cm 6 in from cast-on edge ending after row 2 on chart a don t knit the stitches on needle 2 heel heel is knitted with 34 sts on needle 2 heel flap row 1 *sl 1 k1* row 2 sl 1 p33 repeat row 1 and 2 16 times more turning the heel row 1 sl 1 k18 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl 1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 k to one st before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl 1 p to one st before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all heel sts have been worked 20 sts remaining foot set-up row needle 2 k10 place bor marker k10 pick up and knit 17 sts along the edge of heel flap needle 1 pick one more stitch to prevent the gap between needles 1 and 2 knit 3rd row on chart a pick up one stitch to prevent gap between needles needle 2 pick up and knit 17 sts along the edge of heel flap k10 you should now have 54 stitches on needle 2 and 40 stitches on needle 1 chart b row 1 k14 place marker *k2 p2* 3 times k1 work chart b on needle 1 k1 *p2 k2* 3 times place marker knit to end of round repeat row 1 slipping markers until you have 72 sts left in total this should happen after knitting row 16 on chart b as you might have noticed there s quite many stitches on needle 2 now you can now move the side ribbing stitches to needle 1 just pull the cable through where the two markers not bor marker are and ta-dah stitches are rearranged remove bor marker and knit to end of needle 2
